Name: Critical Force Test
Description: The classical finger flexor critical force test (ff-CF). 7 sec on, 3 sec off for 4 min in total. Pull as hard as you can.

Name: Max Isometric Finger Strength
Description: Test the maximal isometric finger strength (MIFS). Hang for 5 sec with 120 sec pause (3 sets).

Name: Warm-up
Description: This can be used as warm-up for the critical force test. Switch hands after each repetition (10 min).
